overview: Jamboo Savari is a Kannada crime comedy starring Prajwal Devaraj and Nikki Galrani in the lead role. It is the official remake of the Telugu film, Swamy Ra Ra. A small time thief and a journalist get entangled with a precious stolen idol of Lord Ganesh from the secret chambers of Sri Padmanabhaswamy temple in Thiruvananthapuram. A thrilling hunt for the precious idol, forms the rest of the story.
title: Jamboo Savari
